channel.title: CVE Feed for miniorange -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for miniorange -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-34149|2024-08-03T08:16:17.019Z -- miniorange -- wp%20oauth%20server%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in miniOrange WP OAuth Server plugin <= 3.0.4 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-45073|2024-08-03T14:01:31.446Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20rest%20api%20authentication%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in REST API Authentication plugin <= 2.4.0 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-4496|2024-08-03T01:41:44.893Z -- miniorange -- miniorange%20wordpress%20saml%20sso%20standard
item.description: The SAML SSO Standard WordPress plugin version 16.0.0 before 16.0.8, SAML SSO Premium WordPress plugin version 12.0.0 before 12.1.0 and SAML SSO Premium Multisite WordPress plugin version 20.0.0 before 20.0.7 does not validate that the redirect parameter to its SSO login endpoint points to an internal site URL, making it vulnerable to an Open Redirect issue when the user is already logged in.

item.title: CVE-2023-23749|2024-08-03T04:33:23.794Z -- miniorange -- ldap%20integration%20with%20active%20directory%20and%20openldap%20-%20ntlm%20%26%20kerberos%20login
item.description: The 'LDAP Integration with Active Directory and OpenLDAP - NTLM & Kerberos Login' extension is vulnerable to LDAP Injection since is not properly sanitizing the 'username' POST parameter. An attacker can manipulate this paramter to dump arbitrary contents form the LDAP Database.

item.title: CVE-2022-42461|2024-08-03T13:10:40.871Z -- miniorange -- miniorange%27s%20google%20authenticator%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Broken Access Control vulnerability in miniOrange's Google Authenticator plugin <= 5.6.1 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-34858|2024-08-03T09:22:10.822Z -- miniorange -- oauth%202.0%20client%20for%20sso%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in miniOrange OAuth 2.0 client for SSO plugin <= 1.11.3 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-34155|2024-08-03T08:16:17.114Z -- miniorange -- oauth%20single%20sign%20on%20%E2%80%93%20sso%20%28oauth%20client%29
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in miniOrange OAuth Single Sign On – SSO (OAuth Client) plugin allows Authentication Bypass.This issue affects OAuth Single Sign On – SSO (OAuth Client): from n/a through 6.23.3.

item.title: CVE-2022-44589|2024-08-03T13:54:03.908Z -- miniorange -- miniorange%27s%20google%20authenticator%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20two%20factor%20authentication%20%E2%80%93%202fa%20%2C%20two%20factor%2C%20otp%20sms%20and%20email%20%7C%20passwordless%20login
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in miniOrange miniOrange's Google Authenticator – WordPress Two Factor Authentication – 2FA , Two Factor, OTP SMS and Email | Passwordless login.This issue affects miniOrange's Google Authenticator – WordPress Two Factor Authentication – 2FA , Two Factor, OTP SMS and Email | Passwordless login: from n/a through 5.6.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-52176|2024-08-02T22:55:40.260Z -- miniorange -- malware%20scanner
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in miniorange Malware Scanner allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Malware Scanner: from n/a through 4.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-47683|2024-06-04T17:26:43.129Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20social%20login%20and%20register%20%28discord%2C%20google%2C%20twitter%2C%20linkedin%29
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in miniOrange WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn): from n/a through 7.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-52176|2024-06-07T17:09:57.384Z -- miniorange -- malware%20scanner
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in miniorange Malware Scanner allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Malware Scanner: from n/a through 4.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-25902|2024-02-28T13:01:35.916Z -- miniorange -- malware%20scanner
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in miniorange Malware Scanner.This issue affects Malware Scanner: from n/a through 4.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-47683|2024-08-02T21:16:43.635Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20social%20login%20and%20register%20%28discord%2C%20google%2C%20twitter%2C%20linkedin%29
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in miniOrange WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn): from n/a through 7.6.6.
